title: FIFA World Cup winner 's prize money 2018
yAxis: Prize money in million U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Prize money in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Prize money in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2006_(Germany) to 2010_(South_Africa), and finally roughly constant from 2010_(South_Africa) to 2018_(Russia).
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2006_(Germany) and 2010_(South_Africa).
The highest Prize money in million U.S. dollars, of value 38.0 was reached at Year 2018_(Russia)
Minimum Prize money in million U.S. dollars about 19.56 was reached at Year 2006_(Germany)
